attributes.action: Force rioters into submission and restore calm
attributes.additional_details: I am urging the government and the police to use full and real force with these rioters and thieves causing havoc and fear across the cities of Britain. People have the right to feel safe in their homes and this mindless, thuggish, disgraceful behavior has gone far enough. There is no excuse. I call upon the government to put an end to this by allowing the police to stand up and use actual force of which I have not yet seen.
